thread.title: Rand Paul: I wouldn't be doing this 'dumbass livestreaming' if I wasn't still running
thread.title_full: Rand Paul: I wouldn't be doing this 'dumbass livestreaming' if I wasn't still running - POLITICO

author: Nick Gass
title: Rand Paul: I wouldn't be doing this 'dumbass livestreaming' if I wasn't still running
text:
Rand Paul has a simple answer for if he is still running for president: Yes, and I "wouldn't be doing this dumbass livestreaming if I weren't." The Republican presidential candidate, who spent his entire Tuesday livestreaming his campaign in Iowa over Periscope, read a few Google searches about him in a video posted to YouTube that made the rounds on Twitter Wednesday morning.
"The third question, most popular question from Google is, is Rand Paul running for president? And uh, I don't know. Wouldn't be doing this dumbass livestreaming if I weren't. So yes, I still am running for president. Get over it," he said.
The next question he read: "Where is Rand Paul in the polls?"
"This is not live, we can't edit this, right?" Paul asked with a smirk.
